page.title: 14Trade in Waverton
page.content: Trading conditions are very difficult for the small shopkeeper in 1985 with huge Superstores and Foodmarkets replacing the Corner Shop and Village Store.Waverton has a small Shopping Precinct which reflects the national trend.It has a Supermarket(vacant) a unisex Hairdressers,a Newsagents shop, Greengrocers,Butchers,a vacant Sports shop,and a Ladies Fashion shop.Nearby there is a quality Delicatessen and wine shop,a Post Office General store and an Antique Shop.There are several Farm Shops selling to the public,three Garden Centres and two Market Gardens supplying markets in Chester.There is a Chandlers Shop,and Boatyard specialising in Holidays,and selling Caravans.The only industry apart from Agriculture is a small chemical reclamation plant in Fox Lane .Morreys also operate a fleet of bulk tankers.
